website_summaries.verdict: Powerful antiperspirant deodorant with moisturizer technology helps protect skin.
pros: Uses a unique formula for those with sensitive skin or allergies
Only requires a little bit of deodorant to provide ample coverage
cons: Feels thicker and heavier than other deodorants

customer_reviews.title: Worth it...
customer_reviews.text: Good Job sending this to me. Great price & safe packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Dove Men+Care Cool Silver Antiperspirant 2.7 Oz
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells great and the protection is perfect. I like the container and the ease of use. I can't think of an negatives for this product. Pros: Packaging, scent and ease of use Cons: None
customer_reviews.author: Ryan L Logan

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Will definately buy it again. It was 11 dollars at the time I bought it, is totally a Dove product no scam.
customer_reviews.author: Naudy De Leon

customer_reviews.title: Great product... too bad it is no longer available on subscribe and save
customer_reviews.text: I love this Antiperspirant because it works so well and does not have a super strong scent. I just got a notice that it was dropped from subscribe and save, which is disappointing! Please, Amazon, Add it back to subscribe and save (and no, I don't want to try another scent).
customer_reviews.author: Elie H

customer_reviews.title: I like the smell but i don't like the result
customer_reviews.text: I like the smell but i don't like the result. I've been reading low reviews on this product but haven't read one about the problem i encountered, so i'm not sure if i am the only one but this thing is really hard to clean off. It leaves this dry sticky feeling in your underarms and even with soap it's hard to clean it off.
customer_reviews.author: K.L

customer_reviews.title: smells great and works well
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It works well to keep sweat in the pits to a minimum and it smells fresh and the smell isn't over bearing. I had a recent irritation under my arms, but this product did not hinder the healing process at all. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: matt walker

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works better than many other brands I've tried. I like that it doesn't irritate my skin. I have gotten rashes from other brands. The scent lasts all day for me but I feel that the antiperspirant component starts weakening within 6 hours.
customer_reviews.author: B. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great scent and some sweat relief
customer_reviews.text: This deodorant has a great smell to it. As for the sweat blocking, it didn't really work for me. Everyone has a different chemistry to their bodies, so it may work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Tony W

customer_reviews.title: Price, Smell, and Quality are great!
customer_reviews.text: I tossed this in my cart with other products, and was very impressed! Smells great, and I would definitely recommend it for anyone looking to try an new deodorant! Overall, get this!!!
customer_reviews.author: Connor Brady

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: This is some good deodorant. It goes on really smooth, smells good, lasts a long time.... I don't know what else you would want.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked alright but left lots of stains on my shirts where it wipes off on.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Best smelling
customer_reviews.text: Takes a few uses for your body to adapt and stop all the white residue but works great after the trial period. Wouldn't use anything else. Tried it all
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: strong antiperspirant
customer_reviews.text: it is very strong antiperspirant. it is better than my old more expensive ones. if it is not harmful, than it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Shalva Orvelashvili

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is really good product. It has a mild scent, and it lasts 24 hours just fine. It didnt give me irritation at all
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Nice man-smell.  Good size.
customer_reviews.text: There isn't much to say about deodorant unless something goes horribly wrong with it. This one works flawlessly. I was actually impressed because I have used Dove deodorant products some years ago with less than great results. They must have stepped up their game. The smell is manly and quite pleasing. I note that it says 48 hour protection but I don't know anyone who only uses deodorant every 2 days. So this claim went untested. I am a little dubious but that is my own skepticism of anything claiming something spectacular. The deodorant stick itself is a standard "man" stick size. Should last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: JKT

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the first mens antiperspirant that can actually compete with some of the women's antiperspirants on the market. The truth is, women's antiperspirants are made better and stronger. Most guys are blind to this concept and continue to smear the same useless crap under their arms. Dove has hit a home run here. The test of a good antiperspirant is: Is there any under your arms when you get your shower at night? If you notice that it is still there, it is still working. I am not talking about caking it on either. I am talking about one or two swipes. Dove lasts all day with an active lifestyle (competitive runner). Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Tropicalwolf

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: My husband has very sensitive underarms. He usually just wears a women's deodorant/antiperspirant because they seem to be milder than most men's products. The Dove+Care Cool Silver products are designed to work well but still be non-irritating and moisturizing. Dove has always nailed the moisturizing with their products. I just love all their products; with very few exceptions, their products are outstanding. My husband has been using this for a couple of weeks now and has had no irritation but hasn't had problems with sweating and odor either so this is a really good product for men with sensitive underarms. The scent is a nice mild scent.
customer_reviews.author: ⛵⚓Seas the Day⚓⛵

customer_reviews.title: Good in a rotation
customer_reviews.text: Most antiperspirant and deodorant makes me extremely itchy. When I had such good success with the Dove Men+Care deodorant, I thought I would give the antiperspirant a try. It's better than most, but still leaves me itchy after a few consecutive days of use. However, I've found I can alternate the deodorant and antiperspirant and still get pretty good protection without any itching. It has a nice neutral scent. If you have sensitive underarm skin, it's worth giving a try to see if it works for you.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Bielefeldt

customer_reviews.title: One of His Favorites
customer_reviews.text: My husband recently tried this deodorant and really likes it. He said it goes on smoothly with no chunks or little crumbs (some solids he has tried in the past have done that so he usually uses gels). It gives good protection from sweat and odor. And he really likes the way you turn the deodorant out. A lot of deodorants have a small little dial in the bottom to turn, but with this one you turn the whole entire bottom. He finds that easier. He said he'd definitely use this again.
customer_reviews.author: mom shopper

customer_reviews.title: Hubby Loves This
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my hubby and he really really likes it. Says the fragrance is nice and it goes on good. He said that after eight hours of hard work it's still working for him which made him really happy. He has been using another brand for years and years and was a bit leary of trying something new but has no regrets. What makes him happy makes me happy especially when he doesn't come in a bit smelly from working.
customer_reviews.author: Brake4Moose

customer_reviews.title: Works well, nice fragrance
customer_reviews.text: If you are in the market for an antiperspirant not combined with a deodorant, Dove is a good choice. This antiperspirant has a nice fragrance and it worked well for my husband. It did not leave any marks on his clothes after application. It also went on smooth, was nonirritating and protected well. He was unwilling to put the claim of 48 hour protection to the test - a decision I was secretly glad for.
customer_reviews.author: knitting ninja

customer_reviews.title: Smells great
customer_reviews.text: This Dove cool care smells great and works well. I didn't notice a distinct difference with the silver nanoparticles, but silver is fairly well respected to be an antibiotic and I imagine it has some minor antiperspirant benefits. I've never had an irritation issue, so I can only confirm that this did not cause any new issues.
customer_reviews.author: GX

customer_reviews.title: Effective, not overpowering
customer_reviews.text: I've only ever had good experiences with Dove products so I wasn't surprised that this one delivers what it promises. It will keep you absolutely dry, it doesn't irritate the skin, and the scent, while recognizable as a masculine type cologne smell, is not nearly as strong or overpowering as many of the other popular ones on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Nero Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from Dove
customer_reviews.text: This deodorant has a pleasant smell, masculine without being overly powerful. I did not test the claim that it worked for 48 hours, but um, that's your call. We're gym people - we put on deodorant often. :) No irritation, and as a fan of Dove products my husband said he would be fine switching to this one for the future.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Its deodorant, it lasts a full day, and I have had no issues with sweat, cleans off fine in the shower, and dries fast. I would definitly recommend it, not the cheapest but it works great where I have had plenty of others fail. The odor is pleasant, my fiance has mistaken it for me putting cologne on a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Great Performance
customer_reviews.text: Im a Degree deodorant fan, but i am now a fan of this Dove Antiperspirant and deodorant. It provides a long lasting protection for me because i am a little over weight and need all day coverage. A great alternative for me for Degree also because they have the same active ingredients and no irritants. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M. T.Pope

customer_reviews.title: Works...not much smell
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been using this for about a month. He likes it a lot, it keeps him from sweating and more importantly it doesn't quit working for him to start smelling. There is very little smell to the antiperspirant itself, so if you like the low-smell toiletry items, this is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy W.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well But...
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smooth and clear without an overpowering scent. Not a big fan of all of the chemicals in it but most deodorants contain aluminum and other metals anymore. I think $7 is too much for this product. I'd pay $4 to $5 at the most.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: and it was no better than other aluminum based products I have not been ...
customer_reviews.text: If you don't tolerate antiperspirant's because of the aluminum, avoid this. I tried it because it claimed to be non-irritating, and it was no better than other aluminum based products I have not been able to use in the past.
customer_reviews.author: DKN

customer_reviews.title: Mild smell, great protection
customer_reviews.text: To me, as long as an antiperspirant does its job, I am happy. This antiperspirant does the job admirably and has a pleasant, not too strong smell. I like that it is easy to apply and works all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Dave & Amy Astle

customer_reviews.title: I used this for couple months and just this month ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this for couple months and just this month it started to itritate my underarms. Hmm not so sure about this so called "Non-irritant" anymore. I find myself itching and scratching all the time. It's rather bothersome. It also doesn't stop my underarms from producing a little wetness especially under pressure.
customer_reviews.author: MJS

customer_reviews.title: Dove Men Deodorant
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the Dove Men line! They are his favorite products to use. This review is his opinion, not mine. Although, I always like the way he smells after using the various Dove products, too! :) He felt that this deodorant was stronger smelling than most of the other Dove products, but still not overwhelming. It smells manly! It kept him smelling good throughout the day. Overall, he recommends this product, along with most all of the Dove Men products.
customer_reviews.author: Bluerose's Heart

customer_reviews.title: Went On Like Baby Powder!
customer_reviews.text: I picked up two deodorants from Dove recently: The "Cool Silver: Deodorant" and the "Cool Silver: Anti Perspirant." They're both very good. I really like the deodorant because of the very modest, but masculine scent and the fact that a full day in the company's warehouse with no air condition didn't result in under arm odor-- a drenched dress, yes but under arm odor, no. This sole-purpose antiperspirant was also effective today after getting there at 7:30 in the morning and working straight through in this Miami heat until 4 pm. This scent is so faint, it can pass for perfume-free. But, that would miss how effective it really is.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: (Teenager Perspective) Pleasant Smell, but Not An Effective All-Day Antiperspirant
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son is acutely aware of his hygiene products, and he was kind enough to switch over and try out some new brands. Here is his report: Different from Axe products, which seem to be a teenage favorite because of the spray feature (especially in the locker room) the Dove + Cool Silver doesn't have the "sock `em in your face" smell. Rather, the Dove + has a nice & fresh, but not overpowering smell. The smell doesn't linger. However, despite the smell, it is my experience that any white, solid deodorant doesn't last the entire day. The blue solid does. The Dove + is a white solid, so it is not an effective deodorant for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Not a Fan of this Antiperspirant
customer_reviews.text: There really isn't anything wrong with the Dove Men Cool Silver Antiperspirant. But then again, I really don't care for it that much. Once you put it on it feels a bit gooey and sticky, to me anyway, and even the though I don't notice it that much after I am out the door, I just don't care for it that much. I personally am sticking with another brand I like better.
customer_reviews.author: C. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great masculine scent
customer_reviews.text: My husband's a big fan of Dove's men's line, and he loves this antiperspirant. He says it works great, and the scent is perfect (subtle but masculine and doesn't conflict with aftershave.) I like it, too. Some men's antiperspirants are very strong. The more a man sweats, the scent is just overpowering. Not so with Dove. Good product, value priced.
customer_reviews.author: Katy Lake

customer_reviews.title: Very effective
customer_reviews.text: Very effective at keeping wetness at bay, but doesn't leave residue on your clothes. It does have a slight scent to it, but not one that's offensive or likely to interfere with a scent you'd be wearing. A winner.
customer_reviews.author: tmp

customer_reviews.title: the deordorant works and doesn't hang around
customer_reviews.text: ...but this antiperspirant is a white solid product that goes on smooth. But I dislike when my husband wears white antiperpirants because they stick to his underarm hair. The product keeps him dry however. But he wears it only when he's wearing a shirt all day. In Florida, that is not often. I just can't stand those bits of product hanging around. :-(
customer_reviews.author: K. Cade

customer_reviews.title: strong masculine scent
customer_reviews.text: This antiperspirant is a cream based product. It glides on smoothly. It's fragrance is nice. it is a masculine fragrance. It is a bit on the strong side. This antiperspirant works well and is non-irritating.
customer_reviews.author: klz

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the "boy smell" at bay!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a teen boy you know just what boy smell I'm talking about. With the Dove Cool Silver Antiperspirant there is no more yucky, sweaty boy smell in my house. Works great, all day long!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa B.

product_meta.title: Dove Men+Care Antiperspirant Deodorant for Men Cool Silver 48 Hour Sweat and Body Odor Protection 2.7 oz
product_meta.description:
Now in a New + Improved Formula for even better skin protection, Dove Men+Care Cool Silver Antiperspirant Deodorant is a powerful mens deodorant with silver technology that’s designed to deliver up to 48-hour protection from sweat and odor. Its clinically proven, non-irritant formula contains ¼ moisturizer technology to provide you skin protection from irritation. You can feel confident that Dove Men+Care Cool Silver Antiperspirant is gentle on skin without compromising on strength. As with all Dove Men+Care antiperspirants, Dove Men+Care Cool Silver Antiperspirant is tough on sweat, not on skin. It delivers long lasting odor and sweat protection through its enhanced antiperspirant formula. Plus, its clinically proven non-irritant formula, which contains ¼ moisturizer technology, is gentle on skin. To use, swipe this antiperspirant deodorant stick for men over skin to dispense an even layer onto each of your underarms for long-lasting freshness and protection against sweat and odor. Sweating is part of a busy life. That’s why you need a long-lasting men's deodorant and antiperspirant that helps to combat sweat and body odor head on. So the next time you need a strong antiperspirant for men that is gentle on skin that lasts all day, reach for Dove Men+Care Cool Silver Antiperspirant.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


POWER + CARE
DOVE MEN+CARE COOL SILVER ANTIPERSPIRANT
Dove Men+Care Cool Silver Antiperspirant is specifically designed to give men protection—without compromise. Its unique formula combines one of the most effective ingredients for 48-hour protection against odor and wetness with non-irritant 1/4 moisturizer technology.

 * 48-hour odor protection
 * 48-hour wetness protection
 * Non-irritating formula

view larger
feature_bullets: Dove Men+Care Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick Cool Silver, now in a New + Improved Formula
An antiperspirant that blocks sweat and contains deodorant that is tough on odor
¼ moisturizer technology in this antiperspirant deodorant helps protect skin against irritation
Deodorant for men that has 48hr Effective Sweat + Odor Protection
Clinically Proven Non-Irritant deodorant stick formula
Anti perspirant deodorant for men that contains silver technology for a clinically proven, non-irritant formula

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
